testcase.classname: To test About Feature functionality of Apollo Website
testcase.name: To validate book doctor functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Apollo homepage............................................passed When user clicks on hospitals and clinics option............................passed And chooses filters for type and location...................................passed And clicks on view details for any option from the list.....................passed And chooses any of the specialty............................................passed Then it should show the list of speciality doctors..........................passed
